titles: An exhortation to all Friends, who are of late convinced of the way of the everlasting God, and have a true breathing to walk in true obedience unto him.
author: Parker, Thomas.
notes: Signed: The 26th of the 10th month 1673. [brace] Thomas Parker.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Friends' Library (London, England).
keywords: Society of Friends --  Pastoral letters and charges.
